interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 6Pcs Silk Hair Scrunchies, 100% Mulberry Silk Hair Ties Cute Large Scrunchie For Thick Curly Hair No Crease Soft Elastic Hair Bands, Elastic Silk ponytail Holders Sleep and Night Scrunchie for Girls Women…
Review Date: 2022/06/03
Store: Jconly
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Color': 'Green', 'Material': 'Silk', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'Jconly', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Package Dimensions': '7.87 x 5.63 x 1.5 inches; 1.45 Ounces'}
Review Text: These hair ties are absolutely cheaply made. They smell atrocious and I will not be using them. They feel like something you’d buy at the dollar store. They feel cheap and don’t even feel tight enough. -10/10
Review Title: Super cheap
Rating: 1.0

reference_summary:
LXIANGN Nail Glass Cup With Lid Cute Dappen Dishes 2PCS Heart Shaped Bowl Glass Mini Crystal Bowls for Nail Art Manicure Care Tools LXIANGN {} I personally love these dappen dishes!

Many complaints I’ve seen is that the lid doesn’t match the base. But as you can see from the photo, when the lid is on you can’t tell at all. I personally have no problem with them looking different when the lid is off.

The images for the product do look a lot larger then what the product actually is. I consider this a mini size. I absolutely love the size and I am glad it isn’t larger because it fits in my carry all perfectly.

It holds the liquids well and is very easy to clean. I didn’t have issues dipping my brushes into them or removing the access liquid.

I feel like these can even be used to hold all your stud earrings or something small.

Very satisfied with this product. So cute 6 Pack Hair Clips Cobahom {'Brand': 'Cobahom', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Metal', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '3.94 x 3.94 x 0.67 inches; 2.4 Ounces'} These leopard print duckbill clips are so adorable! They are a very pretty yellowish gold type metal and are very sturdy. I personally chose them because my mother loves leopard print and I plan on sending her the 3 lighter ones and I know she’ll love them.

These clips are very easy to use and add so much flare to your hair. I personally like wearing leopard print when I wear solid colors. Cute trick, leopard print goes with ANY color 😉 just don’t mix patterns and I promise it’ll be cute especially if it’s all solids !

They are very well made and I do not see these breaking anytime soon. Sorry I don’t have photos of them in my hair. So lovely! Eyebrow Tattoo Pen, Waterproof brow Pencil, Microblading Brow Pen, Natural Looking, Long Lasting (4# Dark Brown) EINHOOM {'Brand': 'EINHOOM', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothening', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '4.65 x 0.79 x 0.75 inches; 0.63 Ounces'} I did not like how this meshed with my brows. I’m not sure but it really did not look right. I did the upward strokes like my brow hairs but it really didn’t work well. Even when it’s overlapped like in my photo , it looks weird. I would not purchase this product nor recommend. Big nope BQAN 2 Pieces Wax Pencil for Rhinestones, Dual-ended Rhinestone Picker Dotting Tool, Wax Pen for DIY Nail Art, Rhinestone Gems Crystals Studs Picker With Pink Acrylic Handle (Pink & Pink) BQAN {'Package Dimensions': '7.6 x 3.54 x 1.46 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '710050098918'} I received 2 not 1 like everyone else. I have had no issues using it and it feels like a luxury brand. I’ve had no issues with the wax tip or breakage. I would recommend. Very nice First Class Kit, International Travel, TSA Approved, Satin Eye Mask, Travel Pillowcase, Ear Plugs, Antibacterial Wipes, Travel Tissues, Perfect Overnight International Flights, Refreshed Traveler Travel Safety Kit {'Package Dimensions': '8.82 x 5.71 x 1.73 inches; 6.7 Ounces', 'UPC': '860001277357'} This kit is AMAZING!! It has everything you’ll ever need to travel. Just pick it up and drop it in! I love the fact that it comes with a pillow case . That way you can use it at the hotel , take it home and wash it without any worries. The ear plugs are amazing. Love the eye mask! It’s such a cute kit it would make a great gift for anyone. The best kit Cuckoo Face Makeup Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller,Jade Roller Set Facial Beauty Tools,Face Roller Skin Massager for Face Cuckoo ['Cuckoo Face Makeup Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller& Jade Roller', 'Why choose Cuckoo?', 'Cuckoo has one pc of Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller and one pc of Jade roller. The oil-absorbing volcanic face roller can help you absorb excess grease and keep your skin fresh and shiny at all times. The jade roller can improve skin circulation, soothes your skin, reducing puffiness, wrinkling and fine lines to smooth your skin.', 'Advantage Of Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller', 'Prefect Oil Absorption Effect', 'Like oil-absorbing paper, but better.\xa0Roll through your face with volcanic stone balls to instantly absorb excess grease and keep your skin fresh and shiny at all times.', 'Reusable Use', 'Unlike blotting papers for oily skin that are used once and thrown out, this oil-absorbing roller is easy to clean make it reusable.', 'Special Design', 'Built-in special ball design, rolling is silkier and easier, gently or wherever the skin is shiny, rolling the face rollers.\xa0The oil on the face will disappear.', 'Easy To Carry', 'You don’t have to go rooting around your purse for blotting papers anymore.', 'Advantage Of Jade Roller', 'Natural Rose Quartz Jade', 'Natural approach to caring the skin, no dyes, sulfates, parabens or other chemicals. It is made of 100% natural Brazilian rose quartz jade stone.', 'No Crack& Scratch', "Use superb sanding technology to polish the surface of the jade many times. It is super fine and smooth so that don't scratch your skin.", 'Lifts and tighten skin& Improve the blood circulation& Smooth and reduce wrinkles& Reduces dark circles and puffiness'] {'Product Dimensions': '7.87 x 3.94 x 1.18 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Face Roller-1', 'Manufacturer': 'Cuckoo'} For me it works amazingly. I really don’t like when I do my makeup and a little after start to feel oily. I use this and it refreshes my face and absorbs the oil. Love it LordHighting 240 Pieces Halloween Party/ Ball Press on False Nails with Design, 12 Sizes Medium and Long Full Cover Gloss Fake Nails for Woman and Girls LordHighting {'Size': 'Medium', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Brand': 'LordHighting', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Product Dimensions': '7.68 x 3.35 x 1.06 inches; 3.84 Ounces'} I absolutely love this set. I decided to use the shorter set because at the time I needed my nails really short. I prepped my nails and used some glue and these held very well! They are well made and not flimsy like other sets I’ve had but they’re also not too thick. 10/10 would recommend. Very great set Ivnil Nose Strips For Blackheads Remover, Nose Pore Strips, With Instant Blackhead Removal and Pore Unclogging Absorb Dirt And Oil(2-Pack, 16 Counts)For All Skin Type Ivnil {'Brand': 'Ivnil', 'Item Form': 'Strips', 'Product Benefits': 'Cleansing', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Unit Count': '16.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '6.02 x 3.23 x 2.05 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'UPC': '757158884746'} I was supposed to receive watermelon but received orange which was very upsetting. Then to my surprise these strips do not remove the blackheads like they claim to. It left behind so many that it was annoying. It was easy to use but however they don’t work very well. Do not recommend. Left too many behind RBA’s Firming Serum to Reduce Fine Lines and Wrinkles - Improve Overall Tone With Yarrow, Neem, and Spirulina - Daily Vegan Serum - 1 fl oz Round Barn Apothecary {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrates, nourishes, and firms skin', 'Use for': 'Whole Body', 'Scent': 'Yarrow / Spirulina', 'Brand': 'Round Barn Apothecary', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '1.7 x 1.6 x 0.6 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '019962727542'} I love Round Barn products so much and this serum is another amazing product I love. It works so well to keep my skin hydrated especially here in Houston with the humidity. It does make my skin too oily or feel as if it’s weighed down. I 10/10 recommend. I haven’t noticed any firming yet but we will see. Love this serum SKINESQUE Wake Up and Makeup Prep facial Sheet Mask antiaging detox moisturizing Nicinamicide essence korean skin care, 30 sheet masks per container SKINESQUE {'Package Dimensions': '5 x 4.2 x 2.8 inches; 1.22 Pounds', 'UPC': '855501006224'} These masks have been great! They’ve left my skin feeling nice and hydrated. At the end of the day, it helps me unwind and helps let the worries of my day go. They do take a little getting use to by getting them out and correctly placing them but overall I enjoy them. Quick and easy Besame Cosmetics | Forever Red Lipstick - 1925 | Classic Color Lipstick | Vintage Makeup | Long Lasting Lipstick | Semi Matte Lipstick for Women | Moisturizing Lipstick for Sensitive Skin BESAME COSMETICS {'Brand': 'BESAME COSMETICS', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Semi Matte', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Long Lasting,Nourishing,Clean,Moisturizing,Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '4.45 x 1.14 x 1.06 inches; 0.74 Ounces'} This color is absolutely beautiful!!!! It glides on so smoothly and I love that it matches vintage colors. I do not see myself using it often just because it is so expensive. I did think the tube was going to be etched with the design and not just some type of sticker design. Beautiful ❤️ Mented Cosmetics | Better Setter Setting Spray | Alcohol Free Makeup Setting Spray | Finishing Spray for Makeup with Vitamin C and Coconut Water | Hydrating Facial Spray | Vegan, Cruelty Free, Fragrance Free Makeup Mented {'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 1.7 x 1.7 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '810502032719', 'Manufacturer': 'Mented'} This setting spray is really nice but I don’t see myself using it over my preferred setting spray. For one, the price is way too high. That alone is the reason I wouldn’t replace my preferred setting spray. It does well at helping my makeup melt into my face. It does well at holding my makeup all day. Nice setting spray 6Pcs Silk Hair Scrunchies, 100% Mulberry Silk Hair Ties Cute Large Scrunchie For Thick Curly Hair No Crease Soft Elastic Hair Bands, Elastic Silk ponytail Holders Sleep and Night Scrunchie for Girls Women… Jconly {'Color': 'Green', 'Material': 'Silk', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'Jconly', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Package Dimensions': '7.87 x 5.63 x 1.5 inches; 1.45 Ounces'} These hair ties are absolutely cheaply made. They smell atrocious and I will not be using them. They feel like something you’d buy at the dollar store. They feel cheap and don’t even feel tight enough. -10/10 Super cheap
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user has displayed a strong affinity for aesthetically pleasing beauty accessories, particularly those that incorporate vintage designs. However, their recent negative experience with a hair accessory highlights a marked shift towards heightened scrutiny in product quality and craftsmanship, contrasting with their previously discerning yet mostly positive outlook on beauty items.

- **Design Sensitivity:** Their appreciation for charming and high-quality packaging remains intact, but the recent purchase has raised concerns about the overall quality, reinforcing the need for reliable craftsmanship alongside appealing aesthetics.

- **Size and Portability Consideration:** The user continues to prioritize compact and travel-friendly products that fit seamlessly into their active lifestyle.

- **Functionality:** A persistent emphasis on performance and effectiveness is apparent, as the user seeks products that deliver specific benefits. However, recent dissatisfaction with a product suggests a more critical approach to evaluating quality and reliability.

- **Versatility:** The user favors multifunctional items that cater to various beauty needs. Despite their creative approach, the latest experience indicates a potential reluctance to compromise on quality.

- **User Experience:** The user generally maintains an interest in beauty products but has become increasingly selective, particularly after negative interactions. They are now emphasizing the importance of high performance and aesthetic appeal, ensuring that their choices reflect a commitment to both functionality and quality.

In summary, the user is an avid beauty accessory enthusiast, yet they are evolving towards a more critical perspective, captivated by vintage aesthetics but grounded in the expectation of high standards and quality.
